msg: patch from Neeraj Bajaj to handle error conditions in identity constraint decls

author: lmartin
msg: for complexTypes which aren't explicit derivations, set base type to anytype.   Also, some cleanup for error recovery

author: neilg
msg: fixed some NPEs.  Also fixed a problem arising when a reference was made to a component from the schema-for-schema namespace that could not be found.

author: neilg
msg: Fix to some error-reporting vis. entity refs lacking their semicolon.
Now we get error messages like
[Fatal Error] distribution-process.txt:14:9: The reference to entity "aposll" must end with the ';' delimiter.
error: Parse error occurred - The reference to entity "aposll" must end with the ';' delimiter.
[Fatal Error] distribution-process.txt:14:9: The reference to entity "{0}" must end with the '';'' delimiter.
error: Parse error occurred - The reference to entity "{0}" must end with the '';'' delimiter.

author: lmartin
msg: if a sequence or choice has only 1 child, still generate the group
